pageContext.claim: “Today more than 50 countries around the world now recognize the rightful government of Venezuela. The Venezuelan people have spoken and the world has heard their voice. They are turning the page on Socialism and Dictatorship; and there will be NO GOING BACK!”
pageContext.analysis: Juan Guaidó, the interim president of Venezuela recognized by many western countries, did not compete in the flawed presidential election. Rather, he is the leader of the legislature. If Maduro steps down, Guaidó has pledged to hold elections, but it's wrong to suggest that he is already the "rightful" leader of the government.
